ai.summary: ACW Circular Walk 12U is a short, easy 5.2 km circular hike in the UK. Designed for beginners and families, the route returns to its starting point with minimal ascent, making it a relaxed outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly easy, well-maintained paths with gentle gradients. Expect a mix of compacted trails and some grassy or uneven sections. Suitable for most-weather walking with proper footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Always check local conditions and daylight hours before you set out. Wear sturdy walking shoes and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths and respect private property. Carry water, snacks, a map or GPS, and a small first-aid kit. Bring a rain jacket as UK weather can change quickly. Let someone know your planned route and expected return time. Be mindful of other walkers, cyclists, and road traffic if the route includes road sections. If the route crosses roads, use caution at crossings.
recommended_gear: Layers for variable weather (fleece, hat, gloves if cold)
ai.best_seasons: Spring and Summer (also doable in autumn/winter with appropriate clothing and caution).
